dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Elon Musk, right? Like, the guy's absolutely loaded, just swimming in money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Elon Musk, right? Like, the guy's absolutely loaded, just swimming in money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some people think I have a lot of cash, he said. I actually dont.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, no! Not even close, actually!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, no! Not even close, actually!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What? Really? I thought he had, like, twenty billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? Really? I thought he had, like, twenty billion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Tesla and SpaceX CEO confirmed he has roughly a $20 billion fortune (Forbes pegs it at $23.6 billion)

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He does! Yes, exactly! But it's all tied up, um, in rockets and electric cars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He does! Yes, exactly! But it's all tied up, um, in rockets and electric cars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As much as 99% of Musks wealth is held in shares of those two companies, Forbes estimates, which helps explain his lack of liquidity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so he doesn't just have, uh, cash sitting around?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so he doesn't just have, uh, cash sitting around?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: his liquid assets are relatively low. Some people think I have a lot of cash, he said. I actually dont.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! Like, ninety-nine percent of his wealth is literally just shares in Tesla and SpaceX.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! Like, ninety-nine percent of his wealth is literally just shares in Tesla and SpaceX.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As much as 99% of Musks wealth is held in shares of those two companies, Forbes estimates

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow. So if he, uh, gets hit with a big lawsuit, he'd have to sell shares?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow. So if he, uh, gets hit with a big lawsuit, he'd have to sell shares?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If the jury levels a large judgment against Musk, he may have to sell part of his stake in Tesla or SpaceX, a move he has historically avoided.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Or like, borrow more money against them, which he already does.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Or like, borrow more money against them, which he already does.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: (Another possibility: He could borrow more money, using his shares as collateral.) ... Musk has pledged nearly half of his Tesla stake as collateral for those loans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Borrow more? He's already in debt?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Borrow more? He's already in debt?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Musk, 48, owes more than $500 million in debts, according to financial documents published earlier this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah. Over half a billion dollars, apparently!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah. Over half a billion dollars, apparently!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Musk, 48, owes more than $500 million in debts, according to financial documents published earlier this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's insane! For someone that rich.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's insane! For someone that rich.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And he, like, didn't even take his base salary from Tesla. Just stock options.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And he, like, didn't even take his base salary from Tesla. Just stock options.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2018, for instance, the bulk of his compensation at Tesla came in the form of stock options. Musk declined to accept his base salary of $56,380.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And he reinvested those! Yes, exactly! I remember that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he reinvested those! Yes, exactly! I remember that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the firms quickly exhausted most of his PayPal earnings, according to a 2015 Musk biography.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He always says it's not about the money, um, but about affecting humanity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He always says it's not about the money, um, but about affecting humanity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Instead he founded the space exploration company, he said, because it was his way to most affect the future of humanity and civilization. He has made similar comments about his motivations at Tesla.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, like with SpaceX. Even though he didn't really get battery production at first.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, like with SpaceX. Even though he didn't really get battery production at first.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Nope! And then, uh, the Cybertruck window shattering?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope! And then, uh, the Cybertruck window shattering?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last month, during the introduction of Teslas new Cybertruck, he attempted to prove the durability of the trucks armor glass windows with a metal ball. Instead the window shattered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! That was amazing. He just kept saying it was fine!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! That was amazing. He just kept saying it was fine!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Even after two windows just totally, like, smashed!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Even after two windows just totally, like, smashed!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His chief designer tested another window. Then it shattered, too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then he's like, oh, it's bulletproof.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then he's like, oh, it's bulletproof.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! But, like, they have to make improvements before production.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! But, like, they have to make improvements before production.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But, he tweeted, Guess we have some improvements to make before production haha.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, uh, just a tiny understatement, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, uh, just a tiny understatement, I think.
